title: Phil Knight: Shoe Dog (May 20, 2016)
description: Shoe Dog by Phil Knight, founder of Nike.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Phil Knight)
content:encoded: Shoe Dog by Phil Knight, founder of Nike.
itunes:title: Phil Knight: Shoe Dog (May 20, 2016)
itunes:author: Michael Smerconish, Phil Knight
itunes:summary: Michael Smerconish sat down with Phil Knight with his then-new book "Shoe Dog: A Memoir by the Creator of Nike" on May 20, 2016. The book was published in April 2016.
